reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson explains complex concepts clearly. Her enthusiasm for physics is contagious!

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Brilliant instructor. Prof. Chen's projects are challenging but incredibly rewarding.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Knowledgeable, but lectures can be dry. More interactive sessions would be great.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Prof. Taylor brings history to life. His storytelling approach makes every class engaging.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Wong's real-world examples make psychological concepts easy to grasp and remember.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Struggles to explain advanced concepts. Office hours are helpful, but lectures are confusing.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Brown's lab sessions are excellent. She ensures everyone understands before moving on.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Solid grasp of the subject, but could improve on making complex theories more accessible.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Dr. Clark's passion for literature is evident. Her analysis of texts is always insightful.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Balanced viewpoints and encourages critical thinking. Prof. Wilson is a true mentor.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. Garcia's research-based approach provides valuable insights into social issues.

reviews.subject: Engineering
reviews.review: Knowledgeable but sometimes moves too fast. More practice problems would be beneficial.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Dr. Kim's virtual museum tours are innovative and make art history come alive.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Thought-provoking lectures. Prof. Murphy excels at facilitating deep discussions.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. Cooper's field trips and hands-on projects make learning about the environment exciting.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Highly skilled musician, but struggles to convey basic concepts to beginners.

reviews.subject: Neuroscience
reviews.review: Dr. Ali's use of case studies helps in understanding complex neurological concepts.

reviews.subject: Business Administration
reviews.review: Good theoretical knowledge, but could incorporate more real-world business scenarios.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Dr. Rodriguez's interactive approach to teaching languages is both effective and fun.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Prof. Chang makes statistics accessible with practical examples and clear explanations.
